column7: passed away at 4:58 p. m. on thursday
column10: at his home. he was born december 25
column12: in kings prairie township in barry county
column14: the son of the late orville and mable marie (spencer) latshaw. john was a u. s. navy veteran serving during world war ii and a member of the holy trinity catholic church in aurora. he started working for producers creamery in monett on august 10
column16: as a butter maker and was made the department supervisor in 1953. the creamery merged with mid-am in 1969 and he was transferred to aurora
column17: where he remained until 1984. he was then transferred to monett completing 39 years of service with mid-am retiring on november 6
column20: he married leona c. burdolski in columbus
column21: kansas. she preceded him in death on february 13
column22: 1999. he will be sadly missed and lovingly remembered by his three daughters
column27: sharon van. derhoef and her husband
column30: missouri and judy white and her husband
column34: james latshaw of monett and jean latshaw
column41: nephews and his church family. his twin sister
column44: leo and lewis latshaw also preceded him in death. a funeral service under the direction of the crafton-cantrell funeral home
column45: in aurora will be held at 10:30 a. m. on monday
column48: at the holy trinity catholic church in aurora. burial will follow with full military honors at the mt. calvary cemetery in aurora. visitation will be held from 9:00-10:00 a. m. on monday
column51: in the funeral home chapel. online condolences may be shared at this website. funeral information. visitation9:00-10:00 a. m.
column55: in the funeral home chapel. services10:30 a. m.
column59: at the holy trinity catholic church. interment. mt. calvary cemetery. condolencestherese kahre. you are in our thoughts and prayers. we were truly blessed to have john as part of our holy trinity family. i will always remember his sweet smile and kind ways. cheryl and ray elbert. we are so sorry to hear about your dad. he will always be with you in your heart. you will feel him by your your side and you will hear him in your heart. leave condolence. fromemail (optional)message
